component.name: OpenCPN
component.summary: A concise Chartplotter and Navigation software

description.p: A cross-platform ship-borne GUI navigation application made up by a core program, a large set of plugins and freely available charts. The application is configurable with user icon. The core supports:

ul.li: S57 Vector ENC and CM93 chart display

description.p: Plugin support includes wheather, tactical, annotations and tidal data. Pilot charts can be downloaded from project website at opencpn.org. Other useful add-ons may be found inside the "Download" link at at the same site.

ul.li: Presentation av S57 och CM93 vektorkort
Rutter och girpunkter för att styra autopilot

description.p: Ytterligare sjökort kan laddas ner från projektets webbplats opencpn.org. Här finns också ytterligare tillägg till programmet, bl a under länken "Download".
